description: Beginning with Excel 2013 and later versions, Excel no longer allows you to save workspaces as XLW files. However, the application still allows you to open XLW files saved with Excel 2010 and earlier.
To create an XLW workspace file with Excel 2007 or 2010, follow these steps:
NOTE: XLW files do not include workbook data files. They only store the layout of the workbooks on the screen. You must have all workbook files available to reopen an XLW file properly.

common_filenames.description: resume.xlw - Default filename given to the workspace file.
